docs.snippet: Ms. Huffington is trying to change people’s notions of sleep with her new company, Thrive Global....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Huffington is trying to change people’s notions of sleep with her new company, Thrive Global.
docs.abstract: Grace Notes column; Arianna Huffington has reinvented herself 'sleep evangelist,' promoting sufficient sleep through her book The Sleep Revolution: Transforming Your Life, One Night at a Time and latest business venture Thrive Global.

headline.main: Not Sleeping Enough? Arianna Huffington Wants to Help
headline.print_headline: Advice, and a Shop, for the Sleep-Deprived

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Sleep Revolution: Transforming Your Life, One Night at a Time (Book)

docs.snippet: John Bolton, Jon Huntsman Jr., Senator Joe Manchin III and the chief executive of Exxon Mobil, Rex Tillerson, appeared to be under consideration....
docs.lead_paragraph: John Bolton, Jon Huntsman Jr., Senator Joe Manchin III and the chief executive of Exxon Mobil, Rex Tillerson, appeared to be under consideration.
docs.abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump adds former United Nations ambassador John R Bolton, former Utah Gov Jon M Huntsman Jr, Exxon Mobil chief Rex W Tillerson and Sen Joe Manchin III of West Virginia to list of candidates for secretary of state.

headline.main: Trump Expands Search for His Secretary of State
headline.print_headline: Secretary of State Search Is Said to Be Expanding

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from New York.

docs.snippet: Green Party candidate Jill Stein abruptly dropped her petition for a recount of all votes cast in the U.S. presidential election in Pennsylvania after a judge ordered her campaign to post a $1 million bond, court documents showed on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Green Party candidate Jill Stein abruptly dropped her petition for a recount of all votes cast in the U.S. presidential election in Pennsylvania after a judge ordered her campaign to post a $1 million bond, court documents showed on Saturday.

headline.main: Green Party's Stein Drops Pennsylvania Presidential Recount Petition

docs.lead_paragraph: With the dust now settled from the election, Democrats are looking to rebuild the political "blue wall" of traditionally Democratic upper Midwest and Great Lakes states that Republican Donald Trump captured with an appeal to white, working-class voters.
